In a past life, I was a pretty good violinist. I have been playing [since I was 2 years old](img/IMG_5848.JPG). Some of my career highlights include being a member of New York Youth Symphony (Seasons [48](https://www.nyys.org/seasons/2010-2011/) and [49](https://www.nyys.org/seasons/2011-2012/)), serving as concertmaster in several orchestras, winning a concerto competition, managing my own chamber music ensembles, and being a wedding musician.
